comment: She is a great teacher. She is willing to work with you so that you can get the best outcome possible. I would definitely recommend her.

You will have to work for your grade, but it will benefit YOU in the long run. Everything that I did in the course as it relates to reflections etc., has been a benefit for me in the TOSS program. The TOSS program requires you to reflect, as well as make connections to theorist to support your educational beliefs. This course is beneficial!
She is extremely disorganized, very late on getting back to emails, and is unclear about many assignments. Would not take her class again.
She is amazing! Yes a little disorganized but she will give extra points when she messes things up. So very sweet!

Best professor I have ever had.She is kind compassionate & desires only success for her students. Negative commenters must done poorly bc they expected an A to be given to them with little effort instead of earning it. I don't see any other reason for such ugly remarks about such a wonderful professor. I would take every class with her if I could!

Without a doubt, this is the best teacher I have come across in a very long time. She is very helpful and willing to work with you to make the best possible grade. This course was very informative and beneficial. Why she had negative ratings is beyond my understanding, but I enjoyed every minute of being in the class.

Professor Ebener was wonderful! I enjoyed this course very much! She was always willing to help and was quick in replying to emails! Most of our work was online and it challenged us to learn but was not busy work or too hard. I recommend Professor Ebener to anyone who wants to get a good grade and have a good time in class. I enjoyed going!

I absolutely loved Prof. Ebener!! She is always super helpful and is so passionate about teaching! The class was hybrid, but I wish the class was more than just once a week. Super interactive. Being a Bio Ed major? she always had great advice on what I should do and how to approach situations. She is definitely the teacher to choose!!
Extremely disorganized, but I still managed to make an A. She's makes racey and says extremely disrespectful comments regarding people's personalities and interests. I would not take her class again.

Professor Ebener has lots of personality.  She is different but really cares about her students.  When I missed class, she emailed and asked how she could help me.  Most instructors would never do this.

I learned so much from her about actual teaching in the day-to-day classroom.  She gave us strategies to use versus just educational theory.  I enjoyed the class and would take another course she taught.

Worst teacher I have had at KSU yet. This was probably the most disorganized class I have ever been in. Never gave us a tentative schedule. Unclear about assignments. She should probably not tell a student that she's "smarter than they look". Would tell us one thing and do another. Treats it like a middle/high school classroom.

This course was an extremely time consuming & demanding course due to the the large amount and time needed  on assignments.Could be disorganized at times and changed due dates throughout the entire semester, which caused confusion. Overall, this class was informative and was more than willing to clarify confusion and make accommodations if needed.
